field.name: HorizontalVelMax
field.description: Maximum speed the autopilot will try to achieve, usually for long distances

field.name: HorizontalVelMin
field.description: Minimum speed the autopilot will try to run, for example when loitering

field.name: VelocityFeedForward
field.description: How many seconds to plan the flight vector ahead when initiating necessary heading changes - increase for vehicles with sluggish response

field.name: HorizontalPosP
field.description: Proportional coefficient for correction vector in path vector field to get back on course - reduce for fast vehicles to prevent course oscillations

field.name: SpeedPI
field.description: Coefficients for desired pitch in relation to speed error IASerror

field.name: ThrustLimit
field.description: Minimum and maximum allowed thrust and setpoint for cruise speed
